item.description: Public Keys In this section you can find my public keys, please fell free to use them while getting in contact with me. My public key fingerprint: You can download the key [here] [] I strongly support the use of encrypred email, if you wanna know more: [Email self defense] [https://emailselfdefense.fsf.org/en/]
